base_description: Brown rectangular USB drive with a cartoon design.
part_description: Two main parts: a rectangular body and a removable cap. The body has a USB connector and cartoon face with eyes and teeth. The cap covers the USB connector and aligns with the body.
internal_interaction_description: The cap slides over the USB connector, protecting it when not in use. The cartoon face design is split between the body and cap, aligning when closed to form a complete image. The USB connector fits snugly into the cap, ensuring secure closure and protection.
external_interaction_description: The USB drive connects to computers or other devices via the USB port to transfer data. The cap protects the connector from dust and damage when not in use. Its cartoon design may appeal to users seeking a fun, personalized accessory.
